assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Written informed consent was obtained from all participants. The study was conducted according to the guidelines of the Declaration of Helsinki and approved by the Ethics Committee of the Research Center of Neurology, Moscow, RF (approval number 6-2/19 of 07/10/2019).
